snippet: Western nations, Arab states and others pledged the aid as Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, said that $6.5 billion was needed to help Syrian civilians this year.
abstract: Western nations, Arab states and others pledge more than $2.4 billion to help civilians who are suffering because of the civil war in Syria; pledges come as Ban Ki-Moon, United Nations secretary general, tells donor conference that $6.5 billion is needed to provide medical care, food, water and shelter for Syrian refugees and civilians.
lead_paragraph: Western nations, Arab states and others pledged the aid as Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, said that $6.5 billion was needed to help Syrian civilians this year.
